context: Is this product compatable with windows 8

context: Will this work on the Xbox 360?

context: I tried to play Call of Duty 4 on my MacBook Pro with this controller.  Plugged it into my USB & it doesn't seem to control anything.  Any suggestion?
response: This device is compatible with mac, the drivers are built into the OS.  If the game doesn't have configuration of buttons for Mac, you will have to use a button mapper software to do sohttp://www.usboverdrive.com/USBOverdrive/News.html

context: Is this the complete version (just like the one on Steam) that has all DLC? I'm pretty sure the DLC isn't even sold separately anymore for downloads.
response: Yeah it is. I'm not sure about how other PC games are with DLC but yes this does include it.

context: Can you choose the DPI levels (I play at 750 and 1100 DPI) or are you locked into pre-set DPI levels (like 500, 1000, 2000, 4000)?
response: You can adjust dpi but it only goes down to 800

context: Hi.  I have a US Xbox 360.  Will this play or it is locked to some other Zone
response: unlock! my location is South KOREA.

context: if i buy pc disk will it let me download it to
response: Yes it will just take note of whatever you do on steam!

context: So when you charge the gamepad this charges with it? You don't need to charge them seperatly right?
response: That is correct. You do not need to charge them separately. The light will turn green when the "Uboost" has fully charged.

context: Does anyone play this game online anymore?
response: Yes, thousands of people still play.  Most just play Attrition (team deathmatch) but all games are populated.  Definitely worth it.  I find it more fun than Call of Duty.

context: I bought this, along with the Special Edition Doom DVD, to play on my Asus laptop.  Game plays okay, but does not recognize pad.
response: Sorry to hear it didn't work with our laptop.  I'm not teach support so I really can't help you other than to say I paired this controller with two home built pc's as well as an Asus laptop and I had no problems.

context: does it come with cords
response: yes it came with cords

context: are the cables included
response: Every cable except the power cord was included in mine.

context: Is this set wireless
response: It is not, Sherry.

context: cn you play this game with an xbox 360/pc controller
response: Yes, you can and it makes it an even more involved experience to play through the game.

context: Can you use the wireless and 3.5mm simultaneously? For example plugging into your own music device while playing a game.
response: No you need to choose one 3.5mm or wireless

context: Can you turn off the lights in a building so enemy's cant see anything?
response: yes, in some maps you can do that and it seems to work but 3d spotting kinda ruins the point of it.

context: WIIL THESE WORK WITH WII U
response: I'm not sure what WII U is. They work good with PS 4.  if you're referring to wii I don't know

context: If we purchase Quickbooks from Amazon, does Intuit still provide support?  They tell me that you may not get their actual product.  Is this true?
response: I've downloaded QB 2013 - I'm continuing to get upgrades.  I've paid for support (as I'm sure you have) effective the end of the year and that continues through the year.  I don't think I've ever purchased QB software from Intuit.  I've always gone to Staples or Sam's Club.  Hope that answers your questions.

context: My roommate got this and I thought it was incredibly cool and high quality.  If I were to get my own pair, would the 2 wireless broadcasts interfere?
response: Most definitly not. It is just like a remote control to a television.the remit will power on the tv that it was made for. So henceforth the wireless head set will only be tuned to the transmitter stand. But just like radios put five of them together on different channels and all play like suppose to

context: Will this control the DVR functions in WMC?  I have one of the new remotes and it lacks many of the functions that you would expect it to have.
response: No this only controls the tv its self it can't be set to use for VCRs DVRs DVD players ECT only tv and xbox

context: I want to buy this for a friend who wants to play Skyrim with DLC's but cant access PSN will he be able to use the DLCs? without internet??
response: Yes, the dlc comes within the game; it's just like downloading the game to your ps3 and the dlc you have to download from your cd to your ps3 seperately.

context: Does this left handed mouse click on the right side so I can rest my whole hand on the mouse and click with my index finger like righties do?
response: The 5 buttons on the mouse are fully customizable using the Synapse 2.0 software (which is compulsory installation to use the mouse). So you can make it a "left click" on any of the 5 buttons you want.

context: Has anyone used this with old-school console emulators, and if so, does it feel okay playing older games?
response: It should work, but the D-pad feels awkward in 2D games in my opinion

context: Why is this game $67.99?? This game is 2.5 years old and all new games are based at $60....
response: I just bought this brand new at my local walmart for $39.99

context: Does this work on Mac?
response: Yes, to my belief the retail box does say this is Mac compatible.

context: does it work on window 7
response: Yes. I use Windows7.

context: Does this include with charger?
response: It runs on AA batteries.  The SP model has a rechargeable battery and should come with a charger, but this one uses regular batteries.

context: does it come with power cord to charge controller
response: It mite but the one I got said it  came with a controller  but it didn't and not only that but the disk drive didn't even work so now I have to use it for parts

context: will it work on windows 8?
response: There should not be any problem unless you don't have enough memory in your system or password restrictions by your anti-virus software or computer manufacturer like Dell.

context: are these games 3 hiden objects system
response: It is a game where you match tiles. It is horribly addictive. Simple but addictive.

context: why are you advertising this as an xbox 360 game when in reality its an original xbox game?
response: Because, as a quick google search reveals, it's an xbox360 game released in 2007.

context: Does this product play Titan Falls?
response: Sorry. I cannot answer your question because my grandson does not have the game you are asking about.

context: Hi,Is the "Festival of blood" included in this collection? as DVD not on a Voucher?ThanksNaren Turaka.
response: Just to let you know, as of May 2014 the Voucher is still active. I purchased this set and was still able to download the Festival of Blood via the voucher inside. FOB is really cool by the way, I'm having a lot of fun with that title alone.

context: looking into getting  a ps4 for Christmas I played the first game and really liked it is this game on par or better then the first infamous?
response: it was just as good as the first with better qraphics

context: How is the quality on these? I'm aware it's a licensed controller, but I'm still curious. PC gamer, have had Logitch F310 fail on me in under a year.
response: Mine's lasted over a year (maybe even two) just fine.

context: I've never had a game consol.  How do PS3 and Xbox compare?
response: Well I never had a PS3 before but from my experience with friends and other people the Xbox is better. While the ps4  is good, the Xbox is better then the PS3. I am not 100% sure on what makes the PS3 better or worse then Xbox, but if you Are asking my opinion, buy the Xbox.

context: can this play Blu ray video?
response: Yes, it will play blu ray, but not HD DVDs.

context: Does this come with DLC's?
response: No, just the main games. I picked up the infinite season pass on sale for $10 right after I bought the triple pack. That was a few months back though.

context: Does this also charge fully or is it like the charging cable where it says it is done charging and about 5 minutes later it dies on you?
response: it charges fully and the batteries work for several hours, depending on how long you play at one time.it grate I'd recommend it.
